tit.e: List of present Noh (traditional masked dance-drama) programs
List of present Noh (traditional masked dance-drama) programs
List of present Noh (traditional masked dance-drama) programs

sen.j: 能の現行演目一覧（のうのげんこうえんもくいちらん）は、能のシテ方五流が、現在上演する演目をまとめた一覧である。
sen.e: The list of present Noh programs is a list of presently performed programs compiled by the five styles of Noh's Shite-kata (main roles).
The list of present Noh programs is a list of current programs performed by the five schools of Noh's shite-kata (actors who play leading characters).
sen.cmt: シテ方五流→five schools of Noh's shite-kata としました。
sen.e: The list of present Noh programs is a list of current programs performed by the five schools of Noh's shite-kata (actors who play leading characters).

sen.j: 現行の演目を一覧することを目的とし、演目別に流派による有無を示した。
sen.e: The purpose is to make a list of presently performed programs and to clarify the programs performed by each school.
The purpose is to make a list of presently performed programs and to clarify the programs performed by each school.
The purpose is to make a list of presently performed programs and to clarify the programs performed by each school.

sen.j: 観は観世流、宝は宝生流、春は金春流、剛は金剛流、喜は喜多流において現行演目となっていることを示す。
sen.e: Kan, Hou, Haru, Go, and Ki represent programs presently performed bythe Kanze school, Hosho school, Konparu school, Kongo school and Kita school respectively.
Kan, Ho, Haru, Go, and Ki represent programs presently performed by the Kanze school, Hosho school, Konparu school, Kongo school and Kita school respectively.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。
sen.e: Kan, Ho, Haru, Go, and Ki represent programs presently performed by the Kanze school, Hosho school, Konparu school, Kongo school and Kita school respectively.

sen.j: 表記が無いものは五流全てで現行演目となっていることを示す。
sen.e: The programs without specific performer marks are performed by any of the five schools.
The programs without specific performer marks are performed by any of the five schools.
The programs without specific performer marks are performed by any of the five schools.
